[docs]class Event(object):
    pass



[docs]class Observable(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self.callbacks = []
        

[docs]    def subscribe(self, callback, unique=False):
        if unique:
            if callback not in self.callbacks:
                self.callbacks.append(callback)
        else:
            self.callbacks.append(callback)

        

[docs]    def unsubscribe(self, callback):
        self.callbacks.pop( self.callbacks.index(callback) )

        

[docs]    def clear(self):
        self.callbacks = []

        

[docs]    def fire(self, **attrs):
        e = Event()
        e.source = self
        for k, v in attrs.items():
            setattr(e, k, v)
        for fn in self.callbacks:
            fn(e)

            

[docs]    def firebare(self):
        for fn in self.callbacks:
            fn()
